abstract: DealBook Online; Iberdrola agrees to buy UIL Holdings Corporation of New Haven, Conn, for $3 billion.
lead_paragraph: Iberdrola will combine UIL’s power and gas operations with its existing local unit and will list the new company on an American stock exchange.

headline.main: Iberdrola of Spain Buys UIL of New Haven for $3 Billion

snippet: Iberdrola will combine UIL’s power and gas operations with its existing local unit and will list the new company on an American stock exchange.
